title: Comparison of the analytical performance of two different electrochemical sensors based on a composite of gold nanorods with carbon nanomaterials and PEDOT:PSS for the sensitive detection of nitrite in processed meat products
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24856-24873
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04629C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wulan Tri Wahyuni, Hemas Arif Rahman, Salmi Afifah, Weni Anindya, Rayyan Azzahra Hidayat, Munawar Khalil, Bingbing Fan, Budi Riza Putra
Herein, two platforms for electrochemical sensors were developed based on a combination of gold nanorods (AuNRs) with electrochemically reduced graphene oxide (ErGO) or with multiwalled carbon nanotubes (MWCNTs) and PEDOT:PSS for nitrite detection.
